metadata.title: CVE-2023-2312 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Offline in Google Chrome on Android prior to116.0.5845.96 allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the rendererprocess to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.(Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
